adidas track pants with front pockets.Rock a sporty look while warming up or relaxing. These versatile track pants have an iconic 3-Stripes look and an open hem. Cinch down the drawcord on the elastic waist for a secure fit when you're hustling across town or playing catch in the park. 

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: Adicolor Classics 3-Stripes Long Sleeve Tee
description: A comfortable tee with long sleeves and fresh 3-Stripes flavor.When a classic gets reinvented, you know it's got staying power and signature style. Slip on this adidas long sleeve t-shirt and head out with high-contrast attitude. The iconic 3-Stripes and an embroidered Trefoil hint at retro vibes with a modern twist. The ribbed crewneck and cuffs keep things classic, through and through.

name: The WIND.RDY Cycling Jacket
description: A wind-resistant cycling jacket made with recycled materials.Layer up for cool days and windy descents with this adidas cycling jacket. Small enough to stuff into a jersey pocket using the built-in pack-it pocket, it's a versatile layer that's easy to wear and stow during a ride. WIND.RDY seals out windy conditions and resists light rain, while a mesh back panel increases breathability during hard efforts. Reflective 3-Stripes on the back add peace of mind in low-light conditions.

name: 3-Stripes Skate Chino Pants
description: Modern chino pants built for skateboarding.Mixing classic chino design with adidas heritage, the 3-Stripes Skate Chino Pants offer a loose fit and heavy cotton twill construction for durability, versatility and timeless style. Featuring an embroidered Trefoil on the back pocket and applied stripes down the sides, they bring a modern approach to a skateboarding staple.

name: Team Issue Tapered Pants
description:
Tapered-leg pants with ankle zips made with recycled materials.Warm-up to cool-down to rest days, pull on these adidas pants and instantly feel cozy. Fleece will keep your muscles ready for action when you're waiting to get in the game. If you do decide to turn up the heat or the weather shifts, AEROREADY keeps you dry and comfortable. Ankle zips make these pants easy to get on and off even with your shoes on. 

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Essentials 3-Stripes Open Hem Fleece Pants
description:
Warm pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.These adidas fleece pants slip on easily to get you out the door with time and energy to spare. Made from a cotton-blend fleece, they keep you warm whether you're racing around or moving at a more leisurely pace. 3-Stripes down the legs shout your brand pride.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials. Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Trefoil Essentials Crewneck
description:
Comfortable crewneck sweater made for daily wear.Sometimes less is more. The adidas Trefoil Essentials crewneck perfects effortless style and timeless design. An embroidered Trefoil adorns the clean silhouette. Made for everyday casual wear, this crewneck serves laid-back vibes with a simple yet bold look.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Pride Pre-Match Jersey (Plus Size)
description:
An expressive soccer jersey made with recycled materials.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

Stand out exactly how you are in this soccer jersey. It comes complete with a streamlined, slim fit and moisture-wicking AEROREADY.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

color: Halo Green S21 / Halo Green S21

name: Ultimate Jacket
description:

Enter the Ultimate Jacket, a lightweight and easy-to-layer running staple that fuses aesthetics with high-performance design. Crafted from stretchy fabric, the jacket features WIND.RDY technology to keep you going in windy weather. The adjustable hood and hem let you customize the fit, while zip pockets keep your essentials secure and easily accessible.

name: Manchester United 23/24 Away Authentic Jersey
description:
An exact replica of the Man Utd performance jersey, inspired by history.A century ago, vertical stripes were a familiar addition to Manchester United away shirts. For the 23/24 season, adidas dipped into the club's DNA to produce an authentic soccer jersey with a design that looks the part. 

The Manchester United 23/24 Away Authentic Jersey was created to perform. The lightweight shirt features HEAT.RDY that maximizes airflow so you can feel cool.. Standing out over those stripes, a heat-applied club badge signals your support for the legendary team. This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines — preventing it from polluting our ocean.

name: Arsenal Essentials Trefoil Tee

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

The minimalist design includes technical details that make a difference when you are focused on moving in the mountains. Low-profile cuffs with silicone grip elastic and a lace hook stay in place over boots and are slim enough to fit under boot gaiters without creating bulk. The waist is harness-friendly, and secure leg pocket is accessible while wearing a harness. Traditional hand pockets offer routine use without a harness. The densely woven materials resists abrasion while maintaining easy movement and a lightweight feel.

Both brands celebrate the love for the outdoors and are looking for creative ways to adopt this aesthetic for modern-day city life and outdoor adventures. and wander was founded in 2011 in Tokyo by Keita Ikeuchi and Mihoko Mori after they met as designers at Issey Miyake. Their fashion expertise paired with the admiration for the outdoors elevates adidas Terrex to create a unique collection combining contemporary wearability with mountain ready functionality.

Get out and explore in these adidas Terrex hiking pants. Part of our collaboration with Japanese outdoor brand and wander, they balance modern design with lightweight mobility for hiking and exploring. Two side pockets offer convenient storage options for your phone or keys.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

name: FC Bayern 23/24 Away Authentic Jersey
description:
A FC Bayern performance away jersey.The FC Bayern 23/24 Away Authentic Jersey draws inspiration from the powerful "Mia san Mia" slogan. Positioned on the collar, the slogan embodies the team's fierce ambition, resolute self-belief, and unwavering commitment to winning. A mentality born in the city of Munich but shared by the club's dedicated global fanbase, wherever they show their support. 
 
Crafted from lightweight fabric, the jersey features HEAT.RDY to maximize airflow so they can feel cool as they put in the work and features a world map-inspired graphic, incorporating striking pink and green diamonds – each of which represents Bayern München fan clubs from around the world. Elsewhere, lightweight details like the crest and shoulder stripes keep things comfortable. A team name on the back confirms shows off team pride. 
 
This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities, and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.

A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partners, Athlete Ally and Stonewall UK.

With two pieces that can be worn together or separately, this adidas t-shirt puts individuality into action. So why not go bold? Grab printed bottoms in a graphic floral or an angular geometric and try this trick for perfect pattern pairings — tie in coordinating colours. We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

name: Ajax Amsterdam 23/24 Home Jersey
description:
A legacy-inspired red and white jersey that puts heritage front and center.From generation to generation, the world class red bar has traced a triumphant journey in the club's rich history. It starts with an update to the iconic vertical red strip where a pinstripe design sits on a matte-shiny base. The Ajax logo moves to the heart of the jersey, alongside the sponsor and adidas logo to amplify the linear look. Mesh inserts and sweat-wicking AEROREADY puts performance first, so you feel comfortable on-pitch or in the stands, while three little Andreas crosses on the back neck are a stamp of homegrown pride.

A celebration of self-expression, imagination, and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color, and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

name: Adicolor Classics 3-Stripes Half-Zip Sweatshirt
description:

Though born from archival designs, this look is modern style at its best — and its most comfortable. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

description:

A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

A timeless tee with Trefoil style in easy-wear cotton.Classics redefined. This adidas tee reinvents casual style with a contemporary twist. Screenprinted with an iconic Trefoil logo, it signals your connection to the brand that shaped sport. Made for everyday wear, it keeps a classic fit in a soft cotton build that creates an effortless look. An essential piece to complete any outfit. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

This tee is made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.

name: Designed for Training Shorts
description:
Stretchy, performance-ready shorts made for strength training.Enjoy distraction-free 'you-time' every time you hit the gym thanks to the Designed for Training Shorts. 


Made to fit how you move, the shorts feature tactical seam placements for extra comfort and ventilation where you need it most. The stretchy yet durable shorts are made from robust woven fabric to allow for your deepest squat yet. Using sweat wicking or absorbent materials, adidas AEROREADY products keep you feeling dry — even in the most intense sessions. Get in the zone and stay there.
color: Pulse Lime S22 / Pulse Lime S22

name: Gym+ Training Tee
description:
A ventilated tee made in part with recycled materials.Made for mobility, this adidas training t-shirt helps you can power through burpees and sled pushes with ease. Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY wicks away sweat to keep you dry. Laser cut ventilation keeps the air flowing so you can push through your toughest gym days.
 
This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: Pride Crop Graphic Tee
description:
A crop tee with graphic good looks, designed in collaboration with Rich Mnisi.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

Love unites, and this adidas crop tee lets you know it in high-contrast color and confident style. Abstract shapes and playful patterns overlap to create a look that feels good to wear for more reasons than one. This shirt was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley. 

For real change to happen, we need to accelerate towards decarbonization. To do that we first need to understand the impact we are already making so we can improve and have a bar to raise.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we measured the carbon footprint (CO2e) of this product, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067.

name: Sportswear Dream Doodle Multi Tee
description:
A soft, everyday t-shirt that puts your love for adidas on display.Unplug from life's distractions and take time out in this comfortable adidas t-shirt. Made from cotton jersey fabric, it feels soft against your body. Cut for a regular fit, it can be worn loose or half-tucked into your joggers or jeans. The eye-catching graphic brings playful adidas energy to any situation whether you're kicking back or catching up with friends. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Essentials Fleece Big Logo Hoodie
description:
A warm hoodie made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.This adidas hoodie is big on warmth and logo appeal. Cut from cotton-blend fleece, it makes an ideal outer layer when only the comfiest, coziest top will do. A handy pouch pocket keeps your phone in easy reach.  

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Designed for Training HEAT.RDY HIIT Shorts
description:
Piqué workout shorts made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Keep your cool during your most intense training sessions when you wear these adidas shorts. Can't decide between spin class or outdoor boot camp? Then don't. Do either one and stay dry and comfortable with HEAT.RDY. Mesh on the outside of the waistband gives you an extra dose of breathability. Zip up your essentials like keys or cards, so you don't have to worry about them falling out. 

This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. This garment contains at least 40% recycled content in total.

name: Designed for Training Tee
description:
A stretchy training t-shirt with tactical seam placements.Whether you're going after that extra rep in the gym or fitting in a quick session at home, the Designed for Training Tee will help you make it count. 

Lift, pull, and push yourself to your limits, fully supported by dynamic cutlines and stretchy elastane that enables freedom of movement in upper body strength training. Tactical seam placement on the shoulders, arms and side body help to prevent chafing, while a unique lift panel will help you reach your gains without restriction. Using sweat-wicking or absorbent materials, adidas AEROREADY products keep you feeling dry as you move.

name: AEROREADY Game and Go Small Logo Half-Zip Top
description:
A moisture-wicking training top made with recycled materials.Meeting friends for a pickup game? This adidas training pullover has you covered. The soft, lightweight fabric won't weigh you down, and AEROREADY takes care of moisture to keep you dry. The half-zip design makes for easy on and off, and the clean, sporty style wears well at the post-game gathering.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Italy 2023 Home Long Sleeve Jersey
description: An Italy jersey designed for fans and made with recycled materials.Italy to the core. The precious foundation upon which Italian culture is built, marble plays a central role in the design of this eye-catching long-sleeve soccer jersey. Alongside gold details and an "Italia" back-neck signoff, dark veins stand out over those famous Azzurri colors. Created by adidas for fans, this version of the shirt includes moisture-absorbing AEROREADY and a woven badge.

name: Essentials French Terry Tapered Cuff Logo Pants
description: Pants made with super -soft French terry fabric.There are endless ways to relax. Whether hanging out with friends recharges your batteries, or a long solo walk is what you need, these adidas pants will be with you every step of the way. The all cotton French terry build is super soft, and the drawcord on the elastic waist gives these pants a comfortable, adjustable fit.

name: Select Pants
description:
Basketball pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Celebrate the rich history of basketball style in these adidas pants. They're made from recycled polyester doubleknit fabric that is soft and super-durable, so you're comfortable while hooping and you stay comfortable off the court as well. AEROREADY manages moisture for elevated dryness, while front zip pockets can hold your wallet and phone. An adidas Basketball graphic on the hip completes the look.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.
